languages.text: "За абсурдностью слов этого старца скрывается лишь снежное полотно смирения... В нем нет интенций оскорбить Императора. Лишь золотое свечение в сердце, как у самых верных последователей Его".

traits.locale_text: "За абсурдностью слов этого старца скрывается лишь снежное полотно смирения... В нем нет интенций оскорбить Императора. Лишь золотое свечение в сердце, как у самых верных последователей Его".

languages.text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."
languages.original_text: "За абсурдностью слов этого старца скрывается лишь снежное полотно смирения... В нем нет интенций оскорбить Императора. Лишь золотое свечение в сердце, как у самых верных последователей Его".

traits.locale_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but the snow-white reverence... He has no intention to offend the Emperor. Only the golden glow in his heart, akin to that of His most faithful followers."

"The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."

languages.text: «Por absurdas que sean las palabras de este anciano, tras ellas no se oculta otra cosa que una veneración pura como la nieve... No alberga intención alguna de ofender al Emperador. En su corazón solo hay un brillo dorado, similar al de Sus más devotos seguidores».
languages.original_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."

traits.locale_text: «Por absurdas que sean las palabras de este anciano, tras ellas no se oculta otra cosa que una veneración pura como la nieve... No alberga intención alguna de ofender al Emperador. En su corazón solo hay un brillo dorado, similar al de Sus más devotos seguidores».

languages.text: “这个老人荒谬的话语中只有雪白的崇敬之意，别无其它……他无意冒犯帝皇。他心中只有金色光芒在闪烁，与祂最忠实信徒的内心之光十分相似。”
languages.original_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."

traits.locale_text: “这个老人荒谬的话语中只有雪白的崇敬之意，别无其它……他无意冒犯帝皇。他心中闪烁的金色光芒，与祂最忠实信徒的内心之光十分相似。”

languages.text: « Les propos absurdes de ce vieillard ne dénotent rien d'autre qu'un respect d'un blanc immaculé... Il n'a nullement l'intention d'offenser l'Empereur. Dans son cœur ne brille qu'une lueur dorée, semblable à celle de Ses plus fidèles disciples. »
languages.original_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."

traits.locale_text: « Les propos absurdes de ce vieil homme ne dénotent rien d'autre qu'un respect d'un blanc immaculé... Il n'a nullement l'intention d'offenser l'Empereur. Dans son cœur ne brille qu'une lueur dorée, semblable à celle de Ses plus fidèles disciples. »

languages.text: 「この老人の言葉の不条理さには、雪のように白い敬愛の念だけが隠されている…彼は皇帝を怒らせるつもりはない。ただ、彼の心の中には、皇帝の最も忠実な信奉者のような黄金の輝きだけがある」
languages.original_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."

traits.locale_text: 「この老人の言葉の不条理さには、雪のように白い敬愛の念だけが隠されている…彼は皇帝を怒らせるつもりはない。ただ、彼の心の中には、皇帝の最も忠実な信奉者のような黄金の輝きだけがある」

languages.text: "Die Absurdität der Worte dieses alten Mannes verbirgt nichts als die schneeweiße Ehrerbietung ... Er hat nicht die Absicht, den Imperator zu beleidigen. Es liegt nur ein goldenes Strahlen in seinem Herzen, ähnlich dem der treuesten Anhänger des Imperators."
languages.original_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."

traits.locale_text: "Die Absurdität der Worte dieses alten Mannes verbirgt nichts als die schneeweiße Ehrerbietung ... Er hat nicht die Absicht, den Imperator zu beleidigen. Nur das goldene Strahlen in seinem Herzen, ähnlich dem der treuesten Anhänger des Imperators."

languages.text: "Bu ihtiyar adamın sözlerindeki saçmalık, saf saygısından başka hiçbir şeyi saklamıyor. İmparator'u rencide etmek gibi bir niyeti yok. Gönlünde yalnızca O'nun en sadık müritlerindekine benzer, altından bir parıltı yatıyor."
languages.original_text: "The absurdity of this old man's words hides nothing but snow-white reverence... He has no intention of offending the Emperor. There is only a golden glow in his heart akin to that of His most faithful followers."
